oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers

Class ClusterConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers.ClusterConfig

  • public class ClusterConfig
extends Object
    ClusterConfig describes the desired state of a cluster.

        public int getMinReplicas()
